name: Inchworm Animation
synopsis: Inchworm Animation is the full-featured paint and animation system for Nintendo DSiWare. Beginners and professionals alike can create mind-blowing animations with this incredible handheld tool! Record video, stop-motion and time-lapse photography. Paint on top (and underneath!) with transparency, smooth brushes, and thousands of colours. Other tools include onionskin, zoom, and a pattern editor. Included tutorials show you the ropes. Export your finished masterpieces to the SD card.
